author: Admin
title: Book our studio for a recording session
content: Open 7 days a week, 8AM-8PM, come book an appointment and record with our equipment!

author: Moderator
title: Our new studio
content: In two weeks, a new studio location will open. It will specialize in vocal recording as well as radio broadcasting.

author: Admin
title: Promo recording session
content: In April 2019, all recording sessions will be 25% off! Use your chance and book now!
